description:
I maintain Hypothesis, a library to automatically generate inputs to
your tests (like "a list of integers" or "an object matching this
database schema") -- so you don't have to think of all the edge-cases
yourself. But we can go further! Hypothesis now ships with a
"Ghostwriter" which can write tests for you, based on the function and
argument names you choose (and docstrings and type annotations, if you
use those).

If you're tired of testing but still don't want bugs, come see how we
can take automation to a whole new level :-)
title: Fully Automated Testing
